wikipedia_page.main: Harry Meacher is a British actor, director and playwright.

response: Stage performances have also been performed in the U.K. in dramatisations by Joan Knight, Claire Malcolmson, Harry Meacher, and Roger Sansom, among others. Meacher's version has been produced three times, each time with himself the actor playing Holmes.
In March/April 2015 at the Gatehouse Theatre in London, Judi Bowker played Candida with Harry Meacher as Morell, Sebastian Cornelius Marchbanks and Roger Sansom as Burgess.

She has appeared in numerous theatre productions including major roles in Hedda Gabler, Macbeth, Ivanov, A Midsummer Night's Dream, Three Sisters, and in her husband Harry Meacher's adaptation of Sherlock Holmes.

Bowker has been married to the actor Harry Meacher since 1979. They live in Highgate.Julie Tomlin, "Julie Tomlin’s theatre news: Harry Meacher tries his hand at Chekhov", Camden New Journal, 19 May 2017, accessed 4 September 2021
